name: sticky-notes
description: The app will be built using the MERN stack, which includes MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. The MongoDB database will be used to store all notes and user data, while the server-side code will be implemented using Express.js and Node.js. The front-end interface will be developed using React.js, which will provide a responsive and user-friendly interface for the app.
author: Rellika Kisyula
